name: CreateAndQueryChangeRequest
description: Create and Query ServiceNow Change request
author: ServiceNow

inputs.name: ServiceNowConnection
inputs.label: ServiceNow connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection to the ServiceNow instance used for change management.

inputs.name: shortdescription
inputs.label: Short Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Short description of the change request

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Description of the change request. Use 
 for newline.

inputs.name: category
inputs.label: Category
inputs.helpMarkDown: Category (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: priority
inputs.label: Priority
inputs.helpMarkDown: Priority (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: risk
inputs.label: Risk
inputs.helpMarkDown: Risk (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: impact
inputs.label: Impact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Impact (label or value) of the change request.

inputs.name: configurationitem
inputs.label: Configuration Item
inputs.helpMarkDown: Item or service (display name or sys_id) defined in ServiceNow that is affected by this pipeline.

inputs.name: assignmentgroup
inputs.label: Assignment Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Group of ServiceNow users who can approve and update the change request.

inputs.name: schedulestarttime
inputs.label: Planned start date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Planned start time of the change request in UTC (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format). eg. 2018-01-31T07:56:59Z

inputs.name: scheduleendtime
inputs.label: Planned end date
inputs.helpMarkDown: Planned end time of the change request in UTC (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format). eg. 2018-01-31T07:56:59Z

inputs.name: otherParameters
inputs.label: Additional change request parameters.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional change request properties to set. Specified as Key-value pairs in json format, name being the field name prefixed with 'u_' (not label) in ServiceNow and a valid value. Invalid properties are ignored.

inputs.name: DesiredExitStatus
inputs.label: Desired status of change request
inputs.helpMarkDown: Status of change request that indicates the change request is ready to be implemented. Task would succeed when the the change request status is same as the provided value.

RequestInputs.Body: {  "u_correlation_id": "{{#newGuid}}{{/newGuid}}","u_x_mioms_azpi_eline_metadata": "Release: $(RELEASE.RELEASEWEBURL) \r\n EnvironmentName: $(RELEASE.ENVIRONMENTNAME) \r\n Requested By : $(RELEASE.DEPLOYMENT.REQUESTEDFOR)", "u_short_description": "$(shortdescription)", "u_description": "$(description)", "u_category": "$(category)", "u_priority": "$(priority)", "u_risk": "$(risk)", "u_impact": "$(impact)", "u_cmdb_ci": "$(configurationitem)", "u_assignment_group": "$(assignmentgroup)", "u_requested_by_date": "{{toDateTimeFormat '$(RELEASE.DEPLOYMENT.STARTTIME)' 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'}}", "u_start_date": "{{#if schedulestarttime}}{{toDateTimeFormat '$(schedulestarttime)' 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'}}{{/if}}",  "u_end_date": "{{#if scheduleendtime}}{{toDateTimeFormat '$(scheduleendtime)' 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'}}{{/if}}" {{#if otherParameters}}{{toCommaSeparatedKeyValueList otherParameters true}}{{/if}} }

OutputVariables.name: CHANGE_REQUEST_NUMBER
OutputVariables.description: Number of the change request created in ServiceNow

OutputVariables.name: CHANGE_SYSTEM_ID
OutputVariables.description: System Id of the change request created in ServiceNow
